tweets.text: Raw sewage discharging into the Old Lea from the flood relief channel. @thameswater - why? . Do you have no shame? @EnvAgency any chance of doing anything to stop this disgusting situation. @mayorofhackney - this is our town. https://t.co/Msg0ZgvpB2

@EnvAgencyMids you currently assess H2S from against annoyance (30 min avg 7ug/m3) and health (24hr avg 150ug/m3), what are the effects of several hundred ug/m3 for 12 hours day after day? This is our nightly reality. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL

tweets.text: @SFRS_DanQuinn @shropsfire @TelfordWrekin @EnvAgencyMids Our Service has been at major incident status for more than a year now and dealing with this protracted incident, amongst everything else, is a testament to the team's dedication and determination. We'll done all.

Hearing a gent say his start to the day is sitting on his doorstep with a cuppa to let the landfill gas out of his house. And that‚Äôs the lucky mornings when it‚Äôs left the exterior of the house #stopthestink inhumane treatment from the inept @EnvAgency #stopthestink

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency This is a National disgrace and a local emergency at the landfill site in Silverdale. EA wake up please the tip is out of control and causing untold pain and long term effects. People are on the edge of doing actions outside of their normal characters. We are being gassed. !!!

To be clear, the only reason it isn't  breaking the WHO health level constantly is the strong day/night cycle. It spends most of the day hovering around annoyance levels then shoots well into the hundreds(!) night after night #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency https://t.co/3ZHXbPvGMW

tweets.text: Eventually @EnvAgency have approved the @AffinityWater application on 21 May 2021, almost 2 years, the EA will say this shows they looked into the details, we would argue that they put off making the decision until after they approved the HS2 tunnelling to avoid public debate.

@SianieRoo @alan49479451 @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @Unchecked_UK @EnvAgency Indeed. At least I can say @TheENDSReport, which I write for, is on the case. I have heard some shocking things about the landfill that still have not entered the public domain. Watch this space.

DReadful night across NUL What do you allow to happen at the Hell Hole at weekends @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Your HotLine was burning last night. Shame on You. De @ClareDinnisEA this the Nat Incident it is #StopTheStink @JuliaBradbury @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @DrMariaNeira
